Package controllers

Class MainWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.MainWindowController
  • public class MainWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for handling button clicks and stores references to UI elements for programmatic interaction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPartButtonListener()
      Opens the part form in "add mode" when the add button under the partTableView is pressed.
      void addProductButtonListener()
      Opens the product form in "add mode" when the add button under the productTableView is pressed.
      void deletePartButtonListener()
      If a part is selected in the partTableView, an alert dialog will appear asking the user if they're sure they want to delete the selected part when the delete button under the partTableView is pressed.
      void deleteProductButtonListener()
      If a product is selected in the productTableView, an alert dialog will appear asking the user if they're sure they want to delete the selected product when the delete button under the productTableView is pressed.
      void exitButtonListener()
      Terminates the application when the exit button is pressed.
      void initialize()
      Called when the main scene is loaded.
      void modifyPartButtonListener()
      Opens the part form in "modify mode" when the modify button under the partTableView is pressed.
      void modifyProductButtonListener()
      Opens the product form in "modify mode" when the modify button under the productTableView is pressed.
      void partSearchOnEnter()
      Filters the parts shown in the partTableView based on the text in the partSearchTextField when the enter button is pressed while focused on the partSearchTextField.
      void productSearchOnEnter()
      Filters the products shown in the productTableView based on the text in the productSearchTextField when the enter button is pressed while focused on the productSearchTextField.
      void refreshPartTable()
      Refreshes the data in the partTableView.
      void refreshProductTable()
      Refreshed the data in the productTableView.

      Set this class's reference to the part form's controller.

    • Field Detail

      • partSearchTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField partSearchTextField
        The search text field for parts.

      • productSearchTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField productSearchTextField
        The search text field for products.

      • partTableView

        private javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTableView
        The TableView for parts. It displays all parts on load and a filtered list of parts after entering text into the partSearchTextField.

      • partIDTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.Integer> partIDTableColumn
        The ID column in the partTableView. Displays a part's ID.

      • partNameTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.String> partNameTableColumn
        The Name column in the partTableView. Displays a part's name.

      • partInvTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.Integer> partInvTableColumn
        The Inventory column in the partTableView. Displays a part's inventory level.

      • partPriceTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.Double> partPriceTableColumn
        The Price column in the partTableView. Displays a part's price.

      • productTableView

        private javafx.scene.control.TableView<Product> productTableView
        The TableView for products. It displays all products on load and a filtered list of products after entering text into the productSearchTextField.

      • productIDTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Product,​java.lang.Integer> productIDTableColumn
        The ID column in the productTableView. Displays a product's ID.

      • productNameTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Product,​java.lang.String> productNameTableColumn
        The Name column in the productTableView. Display's a product's name.

      • productInvTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Product,​java.lang.Integer> productInvTableColumn
        The Inventory column in the productTableView. Display's a product's inventory level.

      • productPriceTableColumn

        private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Product,​java.lang.Double> productPriceTableColumn
        The Price column in the productTableView. Display's a product's price.

      • primaryStage

        private javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage
        A reference to the application's primary stage.

      • modifyPartScene

        private javafx.scene.Scene modifyPartScene
        A reference to the part form scene. Used to switch from the main scene to the part form scene.

      • modifyPartController

        private ModifyPartController modifyPartController
        A reference to the part form controller. Used to communicate with the part form scene to initialize the form.

      • modifyProductScene

        private javafx.scene.Scene modifyProductScene
        A reference to the product scene. Used to switch from the main scene to the product form scene.

      • modifyProductController

        private ModifyProductController modifyProductController
        A reference to the product form controller. Used to communicate with the product form scene to initialize the form.

    • Method Detail

      • setPrimaryStage

        public void setPrimaryStage​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Set this class's reference to the primary stage.
        Parameters:
        stage - The application's primary stage.

      • setModifyPartScene

        public void setModifyPartScene​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
        Set this class's reference to the part form scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - The application's part form scene.

      • setModifyProductScene

        public void setModifyProductScene​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
        Set this class's reference to the product form scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - The application's product form scene.

      • setModifyPartController

        public void setModifyPartController​(ModifyPartController controller)
        Set this class's reference to the part form's controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - The application's part form controller.

      • setModifyProductController

        public void setModifyProductController​(ModifyProductController controller)
        Set this class's reference to the product form's controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - The application's product form controller.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Called when the main scene is loaded. This method binds the Inventory part and product data to the part and product TableViews.

      • modifyPartButtonListener

        public void modifyPartButtonListener()
        Opens the part form in "modify mode" when the modify button under the partTableView is pressed. Grabs the currently selected part from the partTableView and passes it along to the part form scene.

      • addPartButtonListener

        public void addPartButtonListener()
        Opens the part form in "add mode" when the add button under the partTableView is pressed.

      • deletePartButtonListener

        public void deletePartButtonListener()
        If a part is selected in the partTableView, an alert dialog will appear asking the user if they're sure they want to delete the selected part when the delete button under the partTableView is pressed.

      • modifyProductButtonListener

        public void modifyProductButtonListener()
        Opens the product form in "modify mode" when the modify button under the productTableView is pressed. Grabs the currently selected product from the productTableView and passes it along to the product form scene.

      • addProductButtonListener

        public void addProductButtonListener()
        Opens the product form in "add mode" when the add button under the productTableView is pressed.

      • deleteProductButtonListener

        public void deleteProductButtonListener()
        If a product is selected in the productTableView, an alert dialog will appear asking the user if they're sure they want to delete the selected product when the delete button under the productTableView is pressed. If the product contains associated parts, a different alert is shown to the user indicating that the product cannot be deleted because it contains associated parts.

      • exitButtonListener

        public void exitButtonListener()
        Terminates the application when the exit button is pressed.

      • partSearchOnEnter

        public void partSearchOnEnter()
        Filters the parts shown in the partTableView based on the text in the partSearchTextField when the enter button is pressed while focused on the partSearchTextField.

      • productSearchOnEnter

        public void productSearchOnEnter()
        Filters the products shown in the productTableView based on the text in the productSearchTextField when the enter button is pressed while focused on the productSearchTextField.

      • refreshPartTable

        public void refreshPartTable()
        Refreshes the data in the partTableView.

      • refreshProductTable

        public void refreshProductTable()
        Refreshed the data in the productTableView.
